NOTES:
This is re-encode of the german cam muxed with the direct audio off TD....
The german cam was really good for a cam.....bit dull and lacked colours etc....but could be fixed.
However there is a slight pulse to the video that scrolls down the screen.......looks better on a normal tv though
The audio was good a bit flat i though and need boosting up abit and was a bit on the low side.....but nice and clear ..


WORK DONE:
Firstly i encoded the 2x cd\&#039;s of the german video ....changing the gamma,lum,chroma,contrast,white balance and rgb black base...
so it added more colour,brigthen it up and made the black look black and also removed the bright/white spots you get.
Then i stripped the audio off hte TD release and remastered it in AA3.0 changing the EQ and also rising the main gain on it.
Then i muxed then all together......now this is where i notice it was out of sync in 9 places all on cd2 when syncing to my video....not sure if TD\&#039;S release
is or not,never checked.......so i have to cut the files into 9...and resync the audio...and then join them all toghether.

Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON\&#039;T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5\&#039;S....BECAUSE THEY DON\&#039;T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it\&#039;s free!!!!
